title: The Bytelandian Cryptographer (Act II)
text: Encouraged by his last successful exploit, the Bytelandian fanatic cryptographer impudently encrypted a three-digit number by subtracting 1 from it.This time he hasreallyoverstepped the mark! Soldier, go and beat him, for Burger King & Country! Oh, and remember your good manners, use Brainf**k (no other language is allowed).InputAn encrypted 3-digit positive integer.OutputThe decrypted value.ExampleInput:699Output:700
